short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copies text to clipboard after it was selected.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically copes text to clipboard after selection. Works after selection was done from keyboard or by mouse. Works in inputs. Allows to skip copying by holding Ctrl key.
